Back in May 2013, everyone has discovered the beautiful action bar effect in the Play Music app (explained by Cyril Mottier , Pushing the ActionBar to the Next Level). This effect is really a great way to make the ActionBar a reactive part of the UI.Yesterday, I discovered the new Newsstand app which introduced a new way to push the ActionBar to the next level. If you open the edition screen, you’ll notice the ActionBar is transparent (without icon) and overlaps a large images set (overlaped by the big magazine icon) describing some news.
